short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables the popup autoplay video from appearing on the bottom right of the Daily Mail website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on detects when the dailymail.co.uk website has added a video player to the page and immediately removes it.
